modules.description: This module implements UDP client functionality for sending OSC packets over a network. It provides operations to create and destroy client instances, and to send OSC packets to a specified socket address. It works with OSC packet data structures and Unix socket addresses, enabling direct communication with OSC servers or devices.

This module implements UDP-based OSC packet reception with address binding and asynchronous handling. It provides functions to create and destroy UDP servers, and to receive OSC packets along with the sender's socket address. It is used for building OSC-compatible network services that process incoming messages from clients.

Implements UDP client and server operations for OSC packet transmission and reception. Works with OSC packets and Unix socket addresses to enable network communication with OSC-compatible devices. Used to build applications that send or receive OSC messages over UDP, such as audio control interfaces or networked sensor systems.

Implements UDP client and server operations for OSC packet transmission and reception. Works with OSC packets and Unix socket addresses to enable network communication with OSC-compatible devices. Used to build applications that send or receive OSC messages over UDP, such as audio control interfaces or networked sensor systems.
